website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo 100S Chromebook offers a sleek design along with solid performance and battery life in our tests at a price that's low, even for a Chrome-OS-based laptop.
pros: Solid performance and battery life in testing

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well made piece of equipment. I bought this as an inexpensive computer for our 6 year old, but am now wishing I had bought another for myself while they were on sale. Now that I use O365, the lack of local storage and installed Office apps is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Captbob

customer_reviews.title: Solid Laptop for Clinical Charting EMR
customer_reviews.text: Solid laptop for web based use. We use these in a busy Physical Therapy Clinic, they get bumped and moved often but start right up especially with the solid state hard drive. The SSD makes the machine launch fast on lid open and these tolerate well what we put them through. We go all day on one charge and use web based programs only.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Snow

customer_reviews.title: very nice laptop, excellent choice for my first laptop
customer_reviews.text: very nice laptop, excellent choice for my first laptop, it takes two usbs, accepts camera memory card, and plug in mouse, has google doc which is similar to word doc...only bad thing is I'm still trying to learn to copy and paste on it which is a necessary for my scrapbooking on it, but does everything I expect from a computer/laptop.
customer_reviews.author: francis reid

customer_reviews.title: THIS CHROMEBOOK IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I have really been enjoying this Chromebook for about a year now. You open the top and you are almost instantly running and connecting to the Internet. The size is nice to toss in suitcase or briefcase and take with you anywhere. The keyboard is comfortable. The screen is fine. This Chromebook has become my "go to" over two arguably much better (and much more expensive) computers in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Nanu

customer_reviews.title: So BEYOND happy!
customer_reviews.text: This was not only an AMAZING deal but it's also a great laptop! I bought this as a gift for my fiancé and he's in love with it. It literally took less than a minute to set it up and connect it to the internet! It's so user friendly and we already use Chrome and Google play for everything so the app store was easy to navigate to add features to the desktop. I can't rave about this laptop enough. The ONLY drawback is it doesn't have an ether net port. But everything else is flawless including the brilliance of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherTN

customer_reviews.title: Good thing in a small package...
customer_reviews.text: I like it...I meant to get a touch, but for what I use this for it is great. Glad I discovered this brand...actually, my son told me about it. Pricing was great also. Very quick to load. I thought that the Cloud would confuse me, but all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer  Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: we were disappointed that it lasted only 8 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter last year. It died in August. We took it to Staples as well as an independent computer repair technician, both of whom said the chrome book was completely dead and could not be repaired. Needless to say, we were disappointed that it lasted only 8 months. We can no longer return it to Amazon, and we have had difficulty reaching someone at Lenovo who can help us, though we will continue trying. $170 is a lot to spend for a chrome book that didn't even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: nmtwins97

customer_reviews.title: The Boys and Staff Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I bought these (2) to take to a Boys Group Home in Ecuador, rather than for myself. The staff and boys use them regularly for school, internet research, and personal access to the internet. They are well pleased with their capabilities and performance. For the price, these more than meet their needs.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Eagle

customer_reviews.title: good product for the $
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for 4 months. So far, good product for the $. starts right up. long battery charge. connects to the network right away. just the right size to put in a small office tote bag. If you just need it for browsing and making simple office docs (writing a doc, simple spreadsheets, simple presentations) this is great. For those wanting to watch movies, play games, the screen quality and sound will disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: LCP_1968

customer_reviews.title: Nice and working well so far..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought an Asus less than a year ago and it broke down 8 months later. This unit is the same size (screen), but feels sturdier and I have hopes that it will stand the test of time! Not having windows is a little hard to get used to... for example I still haven't figured out how to copy and paste single words, you have to copy and paste the whole sentence or paragraph, whatever is written. But I'm sure there's a way, I just haven't figured out how to do it yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Browsing
customer_reviews.text: This little computer is great, except, it is very slow for anything besides browsing the web with a couple tabs open. I had to change my internet habits a bit. With google rolling out play store support, it might be worth getting a large amount of RAM in a chromebook. That being said, if you just need a cheap, sturdy, fast, and stable computer; this is your best option. Also, that body is amazing, can take quite an impact. My friend is very rough with computers, and hers is still going strong after being dropped 2 stories!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Fuller

customer_reviews.title: ONLY LAST A YEAR
customer_reviews.text: This computer its good as a start run but only works for a year meaning the keyboard is not working and i have use the screen keyboard to type. very poor quality. waste of my money and time investing in this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for surfing the web
customer_reviews.text: It does work well, great for surfing the web, youtube, facebook are my primary uses although haven't downloaded a whole lot of apps. I do recommend avast or a anti-malware dowload for it. I do also recommend using a wireless mouse as well, keypad works well but wireless mouse makes is function better but chromebook works well with the clickpad. Great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B Grindstaff

customer_reviews.title: ... only no hard drive it's fast enough plays videos fine wifi-only don't get it if you think it's a ...
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing the Internet only no hard drive it's fast enough plays videos fine wifi-only don't get it if you think it's a laptop I have zero issues with it I knew what I was getting when I bought it
customer_reviews.author: chest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I used it for school and personal use, but I had it for short time due to breakage of the charger
customer_reviews.author: Sean Bell

customer_reviews.title: The Best Budget Laptop You Can Buy.
customer_reviews.text: It's light and it does what it was built for. Keep in mind that you will need cloud printer or set a computer as a host for the printer you need to use. Other than this, the computer is perfect for everyday internet browsing.
customer_reviews.author: Ar1S3

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life, small, light and compact, but the operating system and keyboard take some getting used to. I am not familiar with the OS so it takes some time.....
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hansen

customer_reviews.title: A great functioning Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This Chromebook sometimes freezes. 2 GB of memory isn't enough; it may need more memory to perhaps stop the sporadic freezing. Otherwise it's a great functioning Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Jodoin

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive option for Mac Book Pro.
customer_reviews.text: An inexpensive option for Mac Book Pro. If you're not a power user, this does everything.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyM

customer_reviews.title: parents love it! cheap and simple
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift. parents love it! cheap and simple!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good, fast, computer!
customer_reviews.text: Good, fast computer, Hell, Im using it now. For the money, its a really good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MrsG

customer_reviews.title: The two Lenovo 100s 11. 6 Chromebook's were donated ...
customer_reviews.text: The two Lenovo 100s 11.6 Chromebook's were donated to our grand-daughters small private school. So far they appear to be functioning as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our use! My husband just uses it to play games, etc. No movies as we are not that much into technology. It's fast and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: heyluee

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price but the touch pad needs a nudge sometimes, good battery life and works as expected, also very nice feel to the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Has not let me down! Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: MomShopsHere

customer_reviews.title: You can't really do anything with this laptop. It ...
customer_reviews.text: You can't really do anything with this laptop. It supports nothing you cant even download anything on it. All you can do is use websites
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used In A Professional Application
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased on behalf of one my customers who I thought might have a specific use for. I later checked with them and got positive feedback.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Bernson

customer_reviews.title: School
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses this for school. It weighs less than a kids library book and is nice and snappy. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nucky

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works nice but the speakers died so now I have to use a bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Mikula

customer_reviews.title: I got this machine to listen to radio and music ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this machine to listen to radio and music. The sound is off completely. Not sure how to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: kim kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great CHROME Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of hardware. If you are aware of what a Chromebook, and Chrome OS are- this is an outstanding portable machine. Great battery life, nice display- quality feel to the fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Deals

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because it was exactly the one my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was exactly the one my boyfriend has and his handled all of my online college programs plus it plays videos perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop for the price, perfect for what we are needing it for which is internet browsing and writing papers! Arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Do not recomend
customer_reviews.text: Don't think the processor is very good. Freezes up all the time, No problem with my HP
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Papadinoff

customer_reviews.title: OK for a first computer
customer_reviews.text: Good, basic, machine for my son who is at school. Wouldn't want to use it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson & he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It arrived early and in great shape. he loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my son. It arrived early and in great shape.he loves it
customer_reviews.author: John Brocklesby

customer_reviews.title: he doesn't have a great track record with electronics so we went with this
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9 year old for Christmas and he loves it. All he wanted was a laptop but we were wary of buying something bigger & more pricey, he doesn't have a great track record with electronics so we went with this. It has been great, no issues thus far! Please be aware that you can ONLY use Chrome on this and as a result, you cannot play certain games or visit certain websites. For example, our son loves Roblox but he cannot play it on this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Great for school-aged kiddos
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son since more and more of his school work is driving him online. It has been a great product, easy for him to use and for us to feel more secure about him being online. Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: travelintexans

customer_reviews.title: Wait for Native Android App Feature on new Chromebooks
customer_reviews.text: Wait for Andriod apps in future Chromebooks. I bought this because my old box broke. It is perfectly acceptable but if you don't need a new box now, wait. The new Chr ok mebooks will have the ability to install andriod apps from Google Play store.
customer_reviews.author: U.S. Army Major

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: It will not turn on. It beeps like it will, but then it never does. I am extremely disappointed because it looks so pretty and I was really looking forward to using it.. later on, I was trying to unscrew the back and I dropped it and it suddenly was working. Very weird but at least it's working.
customer_reviews.author: Rayna97

customer_reviews.title: Grest battery life and only needs to be charged for like 1 hour and a half
customer_reviews.text: This thing is lit af. Grest battery life and only needs to be charged for like 1 hour and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Yuh

customer_reviews.title: I really don't like this Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like this Chromebook, and would not purchase it again- not even for the low price. The tracking is awful, and the cursor jumps all over the page when I am trying to type. Scrolling is difficult and not intuitive. I just wanted this machine for word processing, and as it turns out, I never end up wanting to use it for that. Waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best investment in 2016
customer_reviews.text: One of the best investment in 2016. Absolutely love it, worth every penny and it functions exactly like a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Meiqi An

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chromebook!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Chromebook. Lightweight. Well built. Got them for our two boys and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Baptiste

customer_reviews.title: Best Chromebook for the money in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Best Chromebook for the money in my opinion. Fast, affordable, long battery, good screen, good keypad, good track pad, there is nothing bad about it. This model also seems sturdier and a lot more durable than other ones I have seen, you can just tell the quality difference after using it. Exceeded my expectations of a Chromebook, I bought this for college after using a Macbook for years and it does everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: ralph

customer_reviews.title: I hated lending him my $500 laptop
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr old Neighbor Needs to do his homework. I lend this to him and he gets it done.I hated lending him my $500 laptop. Now i don't care. He uses it and gets the job done and I won't be too upset if his little brat brother kicks the screen in, like he did with Apple. The thing Works and that's all we need.It won't wash the dishes, but a kid can do his homework. Everyone should buy one of these just to have it in case the really pricey thing you depend upon is out of whack, for whatever reason.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works great. User friendly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 4 days. Works great. User friendly. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift for my father in law...he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. User friendly and fast as a laptop. Great if you need internet access and for streaming.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Light weight and dose just what I need it to do for me.
customer_reviews.author: syd

customer_reviews.title: IMHO
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and portability but the pad which serves as the mouse stinks. Had to use a seperate wireless mouse because could not get the hang of the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Roger K

customer_reviews.title: Great for the basics.
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift for our daughter who was having lots of trouble with her machine. This system is simple, straightforward and working well. Did not, however, work well with her ancient printer and the replacement for that was a major pain to set up despite proclamations from the printer manufacturer (Canon) and Lenovo that it was "cloud ready", automatic and could be activated in seconds. (Naturally the software for this came on a CD which this type of machine cannot read.) That issue aside, a great value for accomplishing the basics.
customer_reviews.author: Fred ForbesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: quality chromebook
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up and use. Had it for a week now with no issues. Keep in mind that you can't run windows software with these, but they're great for internet use and really just about everything you could need to do on a laptop. I highly recommend lenovo, quality brand too.
customer_reviews.author: Patty M. Sadallah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Touch pad didn't work right from initial set up screen and it was really unusable.
customer_reviews.author: suresh kannaian

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly versatile
customer_reviews.text: This computer is great for college students. Everything is on the cloud and little different to learn when switching from a Windows machine but overall great Buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Triple3

customer_reviews.title: Great for college!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this computer. It isn't amazing but, for the price it is great. A little slow at times. It works great for taking notes for college.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Skinner

customer_reviews.title: It was much more than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: It was much more than I anticipated. It has nice build quality and is a great bang for the buck. However, I think it is a Chrome issue, not the Chromebook's but on YouTube, 1080p60 runs extremely choppy and laggy, like it is unbearable. 1 more thing I do not like is the track pad. You cant just tap to click, but I like the tactile 'click' when you press on it. You have to press very hard for a very minimal click. Other than those two issues, this Chromebook is flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Limited functionality; Chrome OS not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The Chromebook works adequately, but I didn't expect how much I *can't* do or install on Chrome OS. Web apps in Java, such as many games, are out, any small programs that one would normally download and install for free are out. I got this for typing and browsing the web. And indeed, I can browse the web and listen to music, but even Dropbox linkages are not working properly, limiting my ability to sync typed materials. One can install Ubuntu on this, but even that is limited and requires technical workarounds. I highly recommend you go for a basic Windows netbook if you are not a pro user.
customer_reviews.author: Concoriul

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this unless you know about Chromebooks
customer_reviews.text: O.k. Cannot figure out how to adjust the setting so that I can watch movies without the screen saver coming on. Says it comes with free storage to Google Cloud, but did not. Customer service is just so-so. I don't recommend this unless you know about Chromebooks. Sending it back for a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Adam R.

customer_reviews.title: Not Good!
customer_reviews.text: Went belly up after 5 months of use by my granddaughter. No response from the computer just died wont do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ramjet

product_meta.title: Lenovo Ideapad 100s - Chromebook 11.6" Laptop (Intel Celeron, 2 GB RAM, 16 GB SSD, Chrome) 80QN0009US
product_meta.description:
The Lenovo 100S Chromebook is built for the cloud and everything attached to it. You can transfer any file, movie or photo across your 100S Chromebook to your Google powered devices at the press of a button

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Blazing Internet Speeds - Browse websites, stream movies and listen to music with 802.11 a/c Wi-Fi, which offers up to 3 times the speed of traditional 802.11 b/g/n.
Free Online Storage - Lenovo 100S Chromebook owners can look forward to 100GB of free Google Drive storage for two years, giving you space to save your favorite movies, music and photos.
Long Battery Life - Google and Lenovo have partnered to create a Chromebook with all-day battery life, up to 8 hours continuous use. That is serious productivity.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars136 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
